status_options_saved.description: Message that is shown, when the options are updated.

status_selection_incomplete.description: Message that is shown, if no project and requirement is selected.

status_sharepoint_missing.message: Cannot connect to SharePoint, connection data missing.
status_sharepoint_missing.description: Message that is shown, when auth data is missing.

status_format_date.message: Please use the proper date format!
status_format_date.description: Message that is shown for a wrong date format.

status_format_time.message: Please use the proper time format!
status_format_time.description: Message that is shown for a wrong time format.

status_record_description.message: Add a short description at least!
status_record_description.description: Message that is shown for a missing description.

status_record_issue.description: Message that is shown if no issue was selected.

status_record_category.description: Message that is shown if no category was selected.

status_sharepoint_add.description: Message that is shown, when time record was added.

status_sharepoint_add_error.description: Message that is shown, when time record could not be added.

status_github_error.message: Could not retrieve issues from Github.
status_github_error.description: Message that is shown, when there was an error while connecting to Github.

status_github_repo.description: Message that is shown, when no repository was retrieved from Github.

status_github_issue.description: Message that is shown, when no issue was retrieved from Github.

options_other_title.description: Title for the other settings section.

options_form_username.description: Label for the user name input.

options_form_token.description: Label for the access token input.

selection_form_record.description: Label for the record time button.

recording_project_empty.description: Label for an empty project selection.

recording_description_placeholder.message: A short description of your work

recording_date_change.description: Label for the change date link.
